content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: redstone_lamp
inventory=[{"type": "stick", "quantity": 8, "index": 25}, {"type": "gold_nugget", "quantity": 40, "index": 26}, {"type": "yellow_wool", "quantity": 45, "index": 29}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_slab", "quantity": 45, "index": 32}, {"type": "glowstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "redstone_ore", "quantity": 4, "index": 38}, {"type": "netherite_pickaxe", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}, {"type": "structure_void", "quantity": 42, "index": 40}, {"type": "phantom_spawn_egg", "quantity": 55, "index": 41}, {"type": "sponge", "quantity": 22, "index": 43}]

thought: To craft a redstone lamp, I need to place glowstone and redstone in the crafting grid. However, I do not have any redstone so I will need to smelt some redstone ore. I will smelt one redstone ore from slot 38 into the empty crafting slot 11.
Ok
act: smelt from slot 38 to slot 11 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: redstone_lamp
inventory=[{"type": "redstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 8, "index": 25}, {"type": "gold_nugget", "quantity": 40, "index": 26}, {"type": "yellow_wool", "quantity": 45, "index": 29}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_slab", "quantity": 45, "index": 32}, {"type": "glowstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "redstone_ore", "quantity": 3, "index": 38}, {"type": "netherite_pickaxe", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}, {"type": "structure_void", "quantity": 42, "index": 40}, {"type": "phantom_spawn_egg", "quantity": 55, "index": 41}, {"type": "sponge", "quantity": 22, "index": 43}]
thought: I will smelt another redstone ore into the crafting slot 12 to the right of the first redstone.
Ok
act: smelt from slot 38 to slot 12 with quantity 1
